Thousands of flights grounded by blizzard

A blizzard stretching from New York to North Carolina has halted operations at several airports and grounded thousands of flights. FULL STORY

The Eastern blizzard is not just taking a toll on travel: It's also taxing local government budgets struggling to keep up with the emergency. Weather officials reported that 47 states have snow on the ground. FULL STORY
